00040 #ifndef UTILITIES_H
00041 #define UTILITIES_H
00042 
00043 #include <vector>
00044 #include "FrameWithId.h"
00045 
00046 #include <kdl/frames.hpp>
00047 
00052 namespace utilities {
00053 
00060     inline double perpendicularDistance(const FrameWithId& point,
00061             const FrameWithId& linePoint1, const FrameWithId& linePoint2) {
00062 
00063         double x0 = point.getFrame().p.x();
00064         double y0 = point.getFrame().p.y();
00065 
00066         double x1 = linePoint1.getFrame().p.x();
00067         double y1 = linePoint1.getFrame().p.y();
00068 
00069         double x2 = linePoint2.getFrame().p.x();
00070         double y2 = linePoint2.getFrame().p.y();
00071 
00072         double dist = fabs((x2 - x1)*(y1 - y0)-(x1 - x0)*(y2 - y1)) /
00073                 sqrt((x2 - x1)*(x2 - x1)+(y2 - y1)*(y2 - y1));
00074 
00075         return dist;
00076 
00077     }
00078 
00088     inline void prunePath(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path,
00089             const FrameWithId& point,
00090             std::vector<FrameWithId>& prunedPath) {
00091 
00092         std::vector<FrameWithId> localPath;
00093         localPath = path;
00094 
00095         double dmax = perpendicularDistance(localPath[0], localPath[1], point);
00096         unsigned int index = 1;
00097 
00098         for (unsigned int i = 1; i < localPath.size(); i++) {
00099             double d = perpendicularDistance(localPath[i - 1], localPath[i],
00100                     point);
00101             if (d <= dmax) {
00102                 index = i;
00103                 dmax = d;
00104             }
00105         }
00106 
00107         prunedPath.push_back(point);
00108         prunedPath.insert(prunedPath.end(), localPath.begin() + index, localPath.end());
00109 
00110     }
00111 
00112 }
00113 
00114 #endif  /* UTILITIES_H */
